songs.title: Winter Dreams (Brandon’s Song)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Drawing hearts on the foggy glass
New love chase away my past
Nothing but the open road
Saddle up, here we go
1, 2, 3
First winter here in your arms
Flames rising as well fall like stars
Making angels in the snow
Warm, fuzzies, frozen toes
Is this a dream?

[Pre-Hook]
Don't wake me up
If this is love
Please let me be

[Hook]
Swept completely off my feet
This snow globe scene is turning me
This Christmas Eve
"I" became "we"
Don't wake me please
From this winter dream

[Verse 2]
Build a fire to escape the cold
Bing Crosby on the stereo
Tracing letters on my skin
Slowly starts sinking in
You love me

[Pre-Hook]
Don't wake me up
If this is love
Please let me be

[Hook]
Swept completely off my feet
This snow globe scene is turning me
This Christmas Eve
"I" became "we"
Don't wake me please
From this winter dream

[Bridge]
And dreams
While I'm wide awake
The tree, the lights
Staying up late
It's true
I'm in love with you

[Hook]
Swept completely off my feet
This snow globe scene is turning me
This Christmas Eve
"I" became "we"
Don't wake me please
From this winter dream
